info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tippah, central Benton, western Alcorn and south central Hardeman Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Snow Lake Shores, or 14 miles west of Ripley, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Snow Lake Shores, Canaan, Gravestown, Walnut, Middleton, Ashland, Falkner, Kossuth, Saulsbury, Chalybeate, Murry, Brody, Spring Hill, Collinstown, New Canaan, Whitten Town, Hamilton, Bethel and Tiplersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi...and west Tennessee.
